text: Andrew Lambrou (born 25 May 1998) is an Australian-Cypriot singer. He was born in Sydney and his family is Greek-Cypriot. == Career == He competed in The X Factor Australia in 2015, but failed to make it to the final. In 2021, he released his first single, "Throne". In 2023, Lambrou represented Cyprus in Eurovision 2023 with the song "Break a Broken Heart". He finished in 12th place out 26 finalists. == Sources == Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Australian singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants
title: Andrew Lambrou
